title: Coconut and sweet potato red lentil soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon cumin seeds', '1 tablespoon mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon curry powder, or to taste', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '3 carrots, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 red onion, chopped', '400g red lentils', '400g passata', '1 (400g) tin coconut milk', '1 sweet potato, peeled and cubed', '2 stock cubes, crumbled', 'salt and pepper to taste']
